title: Bug 121527  new feature: Cache data set data for report preview works incorrectly
description: Description: Set the "Cache and use first 5 rows" for report preview, but in the preview result and preview in designer there still return the entire data set.  Steps to reproduce: 1.Create sample datasource, create a dataset with "select * from CLASSICMODELS.CUSTOMERS". 2.In the "Edit dataset" dialog, set the "Cache and use first 5 rows" for report preview. But in the preview result of "Edit dataset" dialog, it returns the entire dataset.  Expected result: Return 5 rows for preview.
